item.description:
Tour of Tuscany, Florence & Venice
Jun 22/ Jul 1

- 3 NIGHTS IN FLORENCE IN THE CENTRAL DUOMO SQUARE

- 2 NIGHTS IN A VILLA IN THE TUSCANY COUNTRYSIDE

- 3 NIGHTS IN VENICE

- DAILY BREAKFAST

- VISIT OF FLORENCE with a PROFESSIONAL TOUR-GUIDE

- VISIT OF UFFIZI & ACCADEMY MUSEUMS

- TUSCAN COOKING CLASS

- VISIT OF SIENA AND SAN GIMIGNANO

- CHIANTI & VERNACCIA WINE TASTING

-  PIZZA & GELATO DINNER IN FLORENCE

- VISIT OF VENICE with a PROFESSIONAL TOUR-GUIDE

- VISIT OF MURANO ISLAND

- VISIT OF VERONA - SHAKESPEARE TOWN

- GONDOLA TOUR in VENICE

- FAREWELL BELLINI COCKTAIL PARTY IN VENICE

- ARRANGED PRIVATE TRANSPORTATION

- BILINGUAL TOUR MANAGER, MY SELF, ELSA GRAMOLA

 

$ 2,650 (instead of $ 2,850) + airfare

$ 100 OFF!!! if you sign up, today!!!

 

Elsa Gramola - A Taste of Italy in Austin -
Italy Tours | Italian Language | Cooking Classes
www.ATasteOfItalyInAustin.com

 

ITALY TOURS
TOUR OF SICILY: TAORMINA, AGRIGENTO, PALERMO - JUN 6/15 [$1,650]
ROME, AMALFI COAST, POMPEII, CAPRI ISLAND - JUN 14/23  [$2,499]
TUSCAN COUNTRYSIDE, FLORENCE & VENICE - JUN 22/JUL 1   [$2,650]
NEW YEAR'S IN SICILY - DEC 27/JAN 5  [$1,950]

WHY BOOK A TOUR WITH A TASTE OF ITALY IN AUSTIN?

Join us to visit one of the most romantic places of the world: ITALY! All year around, you can visit different parts of Italy from North to South, to the island of Sicily! My tours are personally designed & escorted  by, myself, Elsa Gramola, as your Tour Manager-Escort.They are very small & intimate groups, with a max number of 10/15 people. I will immerse you in the everyday Italian lifestyle and culture, while making you feel at home. I offer you an experience like no other, because you are touring ITALY with a real ITALIAN!Since this is the land of my childhood, I will take you in places you'll never find on a crowded commercial tour. I will show you an Italy that tourists never get to see! I also organize private, wedding and genealogy tours!!! I have run more than 20 successful tours with more than 30% repeat customers to almost every city in Italy.

Prices do not include airfare.

Let's go! What are you waiting for? :-)
